meaningMnemonic: This is the transitive version of 現れる (to appear), so rather than something appearing on its own, you’re making it appear. So this word means <vocabulary>to show</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>to reveal</vocabulary>, but it’s usually used in set phrases like 姿を現す (to show up) or 正体を現す (to reveal one's true nature).
readingMnemonic: Do you remember learning 現れる? This has the same exact pronunciation!
